title: [Valley of Gold]
description: Large beds of blooming flowers surround a giant silk-covered structure.  The golden material shimmers in the bright sunlight as errant breezes move the cloth in gentle ripples.  Alternating crimson and sapphire pennants flutter high above, suspended on smooth oaken poles.

Large beds of blooming flowers surround a giant silk-covered structure.  The golden material shimmers in the pale moonlight as errant breezes move the cloth in gentle ripples.  Alternating crimson and sapphire pennants flutter high above, suspended on smooth oaken poles.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
